text:
u#ttaqmaH || 
ud-bu#ddhyasvAgnEq prati# jAgRuhyEna miShTApUqrtE sa(gm) sRu#jEthAmaqyaM ca# | 
puna#H kRuqNva(gg)stvA# piqtaraqM ~MyuvA#na-maqnvAtA(gm)#sIqt tvayiq tantu#mEqtaM || 
aqyaM tEq yOni#r.RuqtviyOq yatO# jAqtO arO#cathAH | 
taM jAqnanna#gnaq A rOqhAthA# nO vad^^rdhayA raqyiM || 28
(dhruqvaH - saqtraM - kRu#NutEq - yaH - saqptatri(gm)#Sacca ) (A13)
